sentences.en: ...a detailed list of what fixtures and fittings are included in the purchase price.
sentences.cn: …详细列出的室内设施与装备包括在购买价格中。

sentences.en: a list of this season’s fixtures
City won this fixture 3-0 last season.
sentences.cn: 上个赛季曼城队在该项赛事中以3比0获胜。

sentences.en: From fifteen to closing - time he was a fixture in the Chestnut Tree.
sentences.cn: 从十五点到打烊,他是栗树咖啡馆的常客.

sentences.en: He's become a fixture of that bar.
sentences.cn: 他已成为那家酒吧的一员,就在那里待下来了.

sentences.en: Lighting fixture must be installed at once.
sentences.cn: 必须立即安装照明设备.

sentences.en: Professor Jones seems to have become a fixture in that club.
sentences.cn: 琼斯教授似乎已成了该俱乐部的常客了.
定于星期六与利物浦队的比赛

sentences.en: She was a fixture in New York's nightclubs.
sentences.cn: 她是纽约夜总会的常客。

sentences.en: She was a fixture in New York'snightclubs.
sentences.cn: 她是纽约夜总会的常客。

sentences.en: The cordless kettle may now be a fixture in most kitchens.
sentences.cn: 无绳电热水壶现在可能是多数厨房的固定设备。

sentences.en: The couple quickly became a fixture of society pages.
sentences.cn: 夫妇俩很快便成为了报纸社交版上的常驻人物。

sentences.en: The fixture ended in a goalless draw.
sentences.cn: 这场比赛以零比零的平局收场。

sentences.en: The new fixture package has been hammered out by the Premiership clubs in talks over the last ten days.
sentences.cn: 新的一揽子赛事安排已由各英超俱乐部在过去10天的会谈中经反复商讨确定。

sentences.en: The owner of the house charge us for fixture and fittings.
sentences.cn: 房主要我们支付使用固定设施的费用。

sentences.en: The requirement for a good test fixture is maximum stiffness for the lightest possible weight.
sentences.cn: 一台好的试验固紧装置应该是重量轻而刚度大.

sentences.en: This is necessary because the loads are usually applied normal to the calibration fixture surface.
sentences.cn: 之所以有此需要,是因为所加载荷通常是垂直于校准装置平面的.

words.tran_cn: 固定的；定色的；防挥发的
固执的；<美口>处境...的；准备好的；确定的

固定器；[摄] 定影剂；毒贩子；调停者

phrases.tran_cn: 灯具；照明设备；电灯组件

trans.tran_cn: 固定装置，体育活动， 常客
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that is fixed inside a house or building and is sold as part of the house
